comment: /**  * Sets a new default filesystem for testing  */
code: /**  * Sets a new default filesystem for testing  */ public static void setup() {     installMock(LuceneTestCase.createTempDir().getFileSystem()). }

comment: /**  * Installs a mock filesystem for testing  */
code: /**  * Installs a mock filesystem for testing  */ public static void installMock(FileSystem mock) {     PathUtils.DEFAULT = mock. }

comment: /**  * Resets filesystem back to the real system default  */
code: /**  * Resets filesystem back to the real system default  */ public static void teardown() {     PathUtils.DEFAULT = PathUtils.ACTUAL_DEFAULT. }
